items: Start by kneeling on the ground with your right knee on the floor and your left foot in front of you, with your knee bent at a 90-degree angle.
Place your hands on your left thigh for support.
Slowly shift your weight forward, keeping your back straight, until you feel a stretch in your right hip flexor.
Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release.
Repeat on the other side by switching the position of your legs.
Improves flexibility and range of motion in the hip flexors
Reduces tightness and discomfort in the hip flexors
Helps to alleviate lower back pain by releasing tension in the hip flexors
Improves posture and alignment by stretching the hip flexors and strengthening the core
May improve athletic performance by increasing hip mobility and power
